snippet.title: [PS1] Reikoku - first-person horror adventure
snippet.description:
The game's full name is Reikoku: Ikeda Kizoku Shinrei Kenkyuujo(or Kizoku Ikeda's Psychics Laboratory in English). You play as a paranormal researcher venturing to investigate the strange phenomena occurring in an abandoned mansion. The exploration is done in first-person view with the gameplay representing standard adventure routine largely consisting of scanning the environments for useful information and items. The discovered paranormal occurrences are automatically logged into your journal.

This game isn't going to win any awards as the best horror title on the PS1, but it does have its moments thanks to the eerie atmosphere, creepy imagery and the occasional jump scares.

The music in the intro is reminiscent of one of the tracks from Dario Argento's Suspiria: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wtXz3OlFwZA
